title: 2016 Macro data for Pattiland - GDP, unemployment

content.description:
Include correctly labeled diagrams, if useful or required, in explaining your answers. A correctly labeled diagram must have all axes and curves clearly labeled and must show directional changes. If the question prompts you to “Calculate,” you must show how you arrived at your final answer.

Gross domestic product <math alttext="open parenthesis, G D P, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"> <mpadded> <mo>(</mo> <mpadded> <mi>GDP</mi> </mpadded> <mo>)</mo> </mpadded> </math>, unemployment, inflation, and economic growth are key measures of a country’s economic performance.

The following statistics are from the country of Pattiland in 2016; dollar values are measured in 2016 dollars.
content.question:
Respond to all parts of the question.

(a) Calculate each of the following and show your work.

(i) Nominal <math alttext="G D P" overflow="scroll"> <mi>GDP</mi> </math>

(ii) Real <math alttext="G D P" overflow="scroll"><mi>GDP</mi></math>

(iii) Real <math alttext="G D P" overflow="scroll"><mi>GDP</mi></math> per capita

(b) Debbie is a citizen of the country of Wayland and owns a computer software firm in Pattiland. Is the output produced by Debbie’s computer software firm included in Pattiland’s nominal <math alttext="G D P" overflow="scroll"><mi>GDP</mi></math> calculated in part (a)? Explain.

(c) The GDP deflator for Pattiland in 2015 was 110. In 2016 was Pattiland experiencing inflation or deflation, or is there insufficient information to determine Pattiland’s economic condition? Explain.

(d) Calculate the unemployment rate in Pattiland. Show your work.

frqParts.text:
Respond to all parts of the question.

(a) Calculate each of the following and show your work.

(i) Nominal <math alttext="G D P" overflow="scroll"> <mi>GDP</mi> </math>

(ii) Real <math alttext="G D P" overflow="scroll"><mi>GDP</mi></math>

(iii) Real <math alttext="G D P" overflow="scroll"><mi>GDP</mi></math> per capita

(b) Debbie is a citizen of the country of Wayland and owns a computer software firm in Pattiland. Is the output produced by Debbie’s computer software firm included in Pattiland’s nominal <math alttext="G D P" overflow="scroll"><mi>GDP</mi></math> calculated in part (a)? Explain.

(c) The GDP deflator for Pattiland in 2015 was 110. In 2016 was Pattiland experiencing inflation or deflation, or is there insufficient information to determine Pattiland’s economic condition? Explain.

(d) Calculate the unemployment rate in Pattiland. Show your work.

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model illustrated by an example.
